dmca.title: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: joe bloggs [mailto:bandits@cwgsy.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 2004 6:32 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

www.code9-group.org
ip 67.18.70.169
((169.67-18-70.reverse.theplanet.com [67.18.70.169]))

Bittorrent web site with thousands of copyright materials in the form of
bittorrent hash files.

This is web site www.code9-group.net and www.code9-group.com which was
reported to you weeks ago and they are still being hosted on your servers !
The only difference is you need to make 3 posts to see the bittorrent files.

This information will be passed to the RIAA and MPAA and all the relevant
authorities.


 

 
__________________________________________________________________________
Sent via Cable & Wireless Guernsey system at cwgsy.net
